plot: Del buys a consignment of blow-up sex dolls to sell on to elderly Dirty Barry, who has a sex shop. Unfortunately, the dolls are filled with propane gas and will explode if they are exposed to heat. When two of the dolls self-inflate in the flat, Del dresses them in his late mother's clothes to get them into the van incognito. However, when he arrives at his destination, Dirty Barry is unable to oblige - as his licence has been revoked by the council.—don @ minifie-1

Del's desperate to keep up his yuppie image, but his wheeling and dealing doesn't seem to be going too well. Denzil is also at the wheel of his own self-employed business - as a one-van freight company. But, when he fails to deliver a consignment a dolls from a plastics factory, he is in trouble. Luckily, Del is on hand with a plan to offload his friend's problems - and to doll out a tasty profit for himself in the process. The only snag is, the dolls seem to have plans all of their own...—stevecann2003
